pci_projects_project_creating_explain1: To finish creating your project, please pay the amount listed on the {{ orderId }} purchase order.
pci_projects_project_creating_explain2: If this page still appears a few minutes after you have submitted your payment, please contact our customer services team.
pci_projects_project_creating_not_paid: It seems that you have a pending purchase order for {{amount}} of credits. Please settle it by clicking on "Finalise my order" to start creating your project.
pci_projects_project_creating_not_paid_e: By clicking on "Finalise my order", you will be redirected to a purchase order that will need to be paid via your chosen payment method.
To see your invoice, go to "My account", then "My orders".
